summary: REQ-1 appears largely implemented via a new GoldOfferingsSection component containing the 5 specified offerings and imported into BondsPage. The diff evidence suggests it is placed below the bond catalog grid, and it uses non-emoji UI markers. Some added copy/UI (section title/description and a Premium badge) were not explicitly requested and may risk deviating from “exactly as provided” depending on interpretation.

hallucinated_features.description: Adds a new section heading and marketing description text (“Gold-Backed Investment Plans” + descriptive paragraph) that were not requested as part of REQ-1 (which only specifies listing the offerings with exact names/detail strings).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for additional title/description copy—only the 5 offerings with exact strings; extra copy could be considered beyond scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Adds a separate “Premium” Badge for the premium product in addition to the name already containing “(Premium)”.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 only requires rendering the exact names and detail strings; an additional Premium badge is extra UI not requested and could be interpreted as altering the “exactly as provided” presentation.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates project metadata/state tracking (project_state.json) to include new_feature_requests entries unrelated to rendering the section itself.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is about a static frontend content change on /bonds; modifying project_state.json is not part of the stated requirements.
